channel.title: CALL@Hull News
channel.description: News and updates from the CALL@Hull language resources site

item.title: New resources added to CALL@Hull
item.description: Many new internet resources for language teachers and learners have been added to CALL@Hull.

item.title: CALL@Hull goes dynamic
item.description: The CALL@Hull site This site has been converted from a static site, comprising HTML files, to a 'dynamic' site, driven by server-side scripts using the PHP Codeigniter framework.

item.title: CALL@Hull redesigned
item.description: The CALL@Hull site has been radically redesigned to make it easier to use and bring it into the 21st Century.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 18/09/12
item.description: Just ten new language sites in a range of categories have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update,10/06/12
item.description: New language sites for the Gaelic, Scandinavian, Arabic and General sections have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners. Sorry for the long delay since the last update :(

item.title: Internet language resources update, 26/01/12
item.description: New language sites for the EFL, Italian, French and Multilingual have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners. No Gaelic sites this update, for a change ;-)

item.title: Internet language resources update, 02/01/12
item.description: New language sites for Gaelic and Irish have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 31/5/11
item.description: New language sites have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners, plus a lot of dead links have been pruned from the General category.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 10/4/11
item.description: New language sites have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners, primarily for Gaelic learners, plus some dead links have been pruned.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 17/10/10
item.description: New language sites for Gaelic have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 6/9/07
item.description: New language sites have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 28/06/07
item.description: New language sites have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 02/01/07
item.description: New language sites for a New Year have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 23/6/06
item.description: New language sites, in particular yet more Gaelic language sites, have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 13/3/06
item.description: New language sites, in particular yet more Gaelic language sites, have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: Internet language resources update, 4/11/05
item.description: New language sites, in particular Gaelic language sites, have been added to the Internet resources collection for language teachers and learners.

item.title: CALL@Hull gets a RSS newsfeed
item.description: CALL@Hull has joined the wonderful world of syndicated newsfeeds by publishing a RSS newsfeed.

item.title: Gaelic sites added to Celtic Languages page
item.description: A number of Gaelic language sites have been added to the collection.
